participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Social and easy-going, enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i have never had a steady relationship. i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i work from home.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, often reflects on past experiences and values genuine connections.
participant_2.background: i now live in the city. i'm a recovering alcoholic. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i grew up on a farm.
